```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)

library(tidyverse)
library(here)
library(lubridate)
library(readxl)
library(future)
library(furrr)
library(doParallel)

#Load custom functions
fun.dir <- list.files(here("src"), full.names = TRUE)
for(i in 1:length(fun.dir)){source(fun.dir[i])}
```

# Calibration Slopes
```{r}
calibration_vals <- read_xlsx(here("data/Compiled Calibrations.xlsx"))
```

# Read in and process data
```{r message=FALSE}

jello_pred_data <- get_jello_consumption(dir = here("data/recordings"), 
                                         calibrations = calibration_vals)
```
